Gangon knew he shouldn't, but he stepped in front of BrightBlade........and
took the hits which knocked him up and over BrightBlade and behind
her.......he climbed up and fired upon the ARK with all of his might, hoping
that his shots will count!........
----- Original Message -----
From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 3:42 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Tavatron followed Dinobot outside, the blades on her drill sword rotated,
> prepared to scewer the nearest Pred. Tavatron picked her target,
> BrightBlade!
>
> She let loose a wild hunting howl and fired her optic lasers at
BrightBlade.
> It was long range, so her aim was slightly off, but hopefully she'd get a
> piece of her.
>
> Tav took cover behind a nearby boulder, the rain of weapons fire was too
> much to risk staying in the open. Tav systematically fired her optic
lasers
> at BrightBlade, incase the first shot hadn't connected.
